thread.title: My Real Games Announces New Games for October
thread.title_full: My Real Games Announces New Games for October - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: My Real Games Announces New Games for October
text:
MyRealGames.com
LONDON , October 21,
October is sport and games month at the free games hub MyRealGames.com as a fresh new selection of titles not previously available make their debut on site. These include an addictive 8 ball pool challenge and several fast and furious car games to take Fall full throttle.
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20141208/720121 )
Nikolai Veselov from MyRealGames.com said, "Every month we make a point of uploading a bigger and better selection of new PC downloadable, online and mobile titles for our gamers to enjoy. October is no different so new and returning visitors alike should expect to see lots of new games across nearly every genre with a choice of options for playing online, on a mobile device and downloading for free to a PC. We have some spooky Halloween titles and a great collection of games, racing and sporting challenges to enjoy."
The hidden object game Deadtime Stories is a suitably ghoulish addition for October - perfect for playing in the run up to Halloween . Gamers are invited to unravel a bone chilling ghost story, set in Edward Blackgate's invitation-only cemetery in the darker heart of New Orleans . Players must solve riddles, free trapped spirits and navigate haunted swamps full of sinister thrills to discover the truth behind the demise of a voodoo princess.
City Racing, a PC downloadable car game also roars onto MyRealGames.com this month. Starting with a wrecked car, drivers need to explore the big city, make it first past the line in local events and win enough prizes to repair their vehicle or upgrade to a better one. Fully PC downloadable, only the best racers need apply.
Gamers hankering after a slower pace of life can travel to Italy with MyRealGames.com in Dream Day Wedding: Bella Italia . The hidden object quest is set in the beautifully picturesque Tuscan countryside - but players need to help their clients set the mood and create a breathtaking wedding day before enjoying all that cosmopolitan Florence has to offer. A charming adventure packed with great graphics, players can explore historic works of art while listening to classic Italian opera and mastermind a day never to be forgotten.
For those expecting a busy month, there are also a slew of new games to play from a mobile device such as a smartphone or tablet. One of the standout new additions for October is the compelling Troll Boxing. Troll Boxing is available to play both online and on the go, compatible with iPhone, Android and iPad. The popular action game is fun for all ages and is available to play now.
More new games will be added throughout the month for regular visitors.
To find out more about MyRealGames visit http://myrealgames.com/
